# NewtonOS version history

This article goes over the short version history of NewtonOS

## Version history

Date released 	OS version

August 3, 1993 	1.0

October 30, 1993 	1.1

? 	1.2

March 4, 1994 	1.3

March 14, 1996 	2.0

March 21, 1997 	2.1
